paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: Over 120 different mutations in the TTR gene.

variants.additional_notes: Most common ATTR mutations include TTR T60A, TTR V30M, and TTR V122I.
key_quotes: There are over 120 different mutations in the TTR gene, but the most common ATTR mutations are the ATTR T60A variant, ATTR V30M variant, and ATTR V122I variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant type was mentioned without specific cDNA or protein notation.
